content: this lovely quick winter christmas project is perfect for adding a personal touch to your holiday season whether you use it as an ornament home decoration or gift tag it will surely bring some extra charm to your celebrations * beginner-friendly * small quick project * perfect way to use up leftover yarn * written instructions * photo tutorial crochet hooks 2 mm yarn drops flora drops alpaca drops nord or any similar yarn kaja 15 cotton thread 15 or similar thread you ll need scissors needle tapestry needle toy stuffing or yarn cuttings beads optional size 5 cm / 1 97 inches
